alert.note: Alert for Grant; Kay (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 12:26AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Kay and Grant Counties through 100 AM CDT... At 1226 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Manchester, and another near South Haven, Kansas moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blackwell, Medford, Newkirk, Wakita, Braman, Deer Creek, Manchester, Kildare, Renfrow, Jefferson, Chilocco, Nardin, northwestern Kaw Lake, Blackwell Lake, and Peckham. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 220 and 236. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
